price: Yewe Mariyamu! Ibombarike kuri Nyagasani wawe, wubame ndetse ununame (usenga Allah) hamwe n’abunama.
arabic: يَٰمَرۡيَمُ ٱقۡنُتِي لِرَبِّكِ وَٱسۡجُدِي وَٱرۡكَعِي مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yāmaryamu uq'nutī lirabbiki wa-us'judī wa-ir'kaʿī maʿa al-rākiʿīna
